thread.section_title: Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best location and excellent staff!
thread.title_full: Best location and excellent staff! - Review of Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: swa2017
title: Best location and excellent staff!
text: Chose to stay here for our twenty-fifth wedding anniversary. The hotel staff was great from start to finish. We were walking distance to our broadway shows and Times square! Would recommend the hotel to anyone looking for a memorable stay in NYC.
